knowledgePoints.name: Reading Comprehension - Main Idea
knowledgePoints.description: Identify the main idea and central theme of a passage

knowledgePoints.name: Reading Comprehension - Supporting Details
knowledgePoints.description: Identify supporting details, examples, and evidence in a passage

knowledgePoints.name: Reading Comprehension - Inference
knowledgePoints.description: Make inferences and draw conclusions from implied information

knowledgePoints.name: Reading Comprehension - Author's Purpose
knowledgePoints.description: Identify author's purpose, tone, and attitude

knowledgePoints.name: Grammar - Verb Tenses
knowledgePoints.description: Correct use of present, past, and future tenses

knowledgePoints.name: Grammar - Subject-Verb Agreement
knowledgePoints.description: Ensure subject and verb agree in number

knowledgePoints.name: Writing - Essay Structure
knowledgePoints.description: Organize essays with clear introduction, body, and conclusion

knowledgePoints.name: Writing - Argumentative Essay
knowledgePoints.description: Write argumentative essays with thesis and supporting evidence

knowledgePoints.name: Writing - Cohesion and Coherence
knowledgePoints.description: Use cohesive devices and maintain coherent flow of ideas
